DOC.brief_title: Autologous Tumor Tissue Antigen-sensitized DC-CIK Cells Combined With Chemotherapy Esophageal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: 60 patient esophageal cancer TNM stage tumor stage II-III , receive surgery keep tumor tissue , randomly divide group A ( receive cancer tissue antigen sensitize D-CIK immune cell combination chemotherapy treatment ) group B ( receive chemotherapy ) , randomize ratio 1:1 . Patients group A receive 3 cycle autologous antigen-sensitized DC-CIK cell treatment ( every 4 week ) chemotherapy . Patients group B receive 3 cycle chemotherapy .
